welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zawyat an Nwacer, Morocco! This charming city is known for its vibrant culture and breathtaking landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Mohamed V Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights and some low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for international flights, with modern facilities and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
